title: Fallen Hope
description: Four years ago, Castle Hope, the prosperous capital of a peaceful kingdom, was attacked from within by a force that seemed to appear out of nowhere. By the time aid arrived from neighboring villages, the castle walls had been magically sealed shut, and no one knew who was behind the assault or what had become of the Royal Family or the castle inhabitants who had not escaped. To this day, the castle remains locked by enchantments. What does Reva have to do with this? Perhaps nothing at all… or perhaps everything.Reva, a young girl suffering from extreme memory loss, has resided in safety and peace in the home of the Seven Dwarfs for four years. Her comfortable lifestyle suddenly changes upon the unexpected visit of Snow White, who alerts the household of shady figures searching for a girl with a medallion, one of the few possessions Reva has from her former life.Reva’s world is turned upside-down as she finds herself in the royal company of Snow White, Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty and others, constantly running from unknown enemies while she tries to discover her mysterious past. Along the way, she will learn of details in the Princesses’ stories that have been kept hidden from the rest of the world….
author: AubreElle Roske
